title: What Does the 💚 Green Heart Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 💚 evokes caring and platonic loving feelings.
steps.content: The 💚 evokes caring and platonic loving feelings. This colored heart emoji is a tamer version of the classic ❤️. You’ll often see a 💚 used when expressing a platonic love for a friend or acquaintance. [1] X Research source Try adding this green heart to a heart-warming message to tell a friend, “ I care about you. ” “You’re the bestest friend a girl could ask for 💚” “Just take deep breaths. You got this! 💚👍”

steps.title: A 💚 represents love for the environment.
steps.content: A 💚 represents love for the environment. Nature is typically associated with the color green, making this colored heart emoji the perfect way to say, “I love the planet!” A 💚 will most likely appear when someone talks about nature or the importance of being eco-friendly. [2] X Research source “It’s World Environment Day! 🌎 Let’s work together to make the world a cleaner and more sustainable place 💚♻️” “There’s nothing better than a nature hike 💚🌲🙂”

steps.title: The 💚 expresses feelings of gratitude.
steps.content: The 💚 expresses feelings of gratitude. This colored heart emoji may appear when someone is thankful for something. They could be talking about nature, friends, or a loved one. When you want to say “thank you,” add a 💚 to your text. “Where would I be without you? 💚” “Thank you for tutoring me this semester! I couldn’t have passed that final without your help 🙂💚”

steps.title: A 💚 can also symbolize jealousy.
steps.content: A 💚 can also symbolize jealousy. Have you ever heard the phrase “green with envy”? If someone is jealous or envious of something or someone, they may add a 💚 to their message. This is a lighthearted way to say, “I’m so jealous!” Consider using this heart emoji when you’re envious of someone’s outfit or have a case of FOMO. [3] X Research source “Ugh, I want her dress 💚” “I wish I could go to the concert with you 💚🙃”

steps.title: A 💚 represents all things green.
steps.content: A 💚 represents all things green. If someone loves the color green, you may see this colored heart emoji popping up in their social media bios and captions. You can use the 💚 when mentioning anything green in color, or replace the ❤️ with its green sibling to say “ I love you ” in your favorite color. [4] X Research source “Green is the best color 💚” “You mean the world to me, baby 💚😘”

steps.title: The 💚 can be used when talking about Ireland or Irish culture.
steps.content: The 💚 can be used when talking about Ireland or Irish culture. Ireland is often associated with the color green because of the country’s lush landscape and green-centric celebrations. Use this colored heart emoji alongside a ☘️ or 🇮🇪 when talking about anything Irish. “We’re going to Ireland this summer to visit my grandparents! 🇮🇪💚 I’m so excited 😁” “I’m proud of my Irish heritage ☘️💚🇮🇪”

steps.title: The 💚 refers to the K-pop group NCT.
steps.content: The 💚 refers to the K-pop group NCT. You may see this colored heart emoji floating around on Twitter alongside hashtags like #jaemin and #zhong. Fans of the Korean boy band NCT will often use a 💚 when tweeting about the band’s members and songs. If you’re a K-pop fan, try adding a 💚 to your next fandom message. [5] X Research source “All 23 members of NCT have my 💚!” “Happy birthday, Jaemin!! 🎂🥳 I 💚 you!! #jaemin #nct #nctdream”

steps.title: The 💚 is often paired with other emojis to express love and gratitude.
steps.content: The 💚 is often paired with other emojis to express love and gratitude. Consider adding this green heart and another favorite emoji to celebrate a specific event or thing. [6] X Research source Check out these common emoji combinations you can add to your next text: 💚🇸🇦: Love for Saudi Arabia 🥺💚: “I love it!” or “So cute!” 💚✨: Magic or good vibes 😭💚: “I love it!” or “My heart!” 🙏💚: Sending prayers 💚🌎: Love Mother Earth 💚🥗: Love for salad ☘️🍺💚: St. Patrick’s Day ​❤️​🧡​💛​💚​💙​💜​🖤​🤍​🤎​: Rainbow

steps.title: The 💚 and its heart emoji siblings have secret meanings.
steps.content: The 💚 and its heart emoji siblings have secret meanings. With nine colored heart emojis on the emoji keyboard, there’s a colored heart for every occasion and emotion! Here are the most common meanings of your favorite colored heart emojis: [7] X Research source ❤️​: Love 🧡: Care ​ 💛: Friendship 💙: Peace ​💜: Wealth 🖤: Sorrow ​🤍: Purity 🤎​: Solidarity
